196331.「イエーイッ！ イチバン乗りだなんて\n さっすが 大物ルーキー <pc>さん！:
Yay! You're the best rider! Just as I'd expect
from our rising star, <pc>!
Seriously, you're amazing!

196335.「おい みんな～ ひと雨降るぞ！\n どっかに 避難しろ～！:
Hey, guys! It's about to start raining!
Let's blow this popsicle stand!

196336.突然 はげしい雨が 降りはじめ\n<pc>たちは 一時的に 避難した！:
Suddenly, the rain started to downpour,
while <pc> and co. found some
temporary shelter!

196337.「雨は あがったようだけど……。: Looks like the rain's stopped, but...

196340.「フーーッ アメーージング！\n イタ映えェ レインボゥーーーッ！！:
Woooow, how breathtaking!
What a beautiful rainbow!!

196341.「遊び人のオレらが ぱふぱふをしたから\n ギズモがうっとりして 雲のカケラをま:
Looks like the puff-puff we used on those Cumaulus got 'em all dreamy-eyed, and scattered bits of cloud up into the sky...then it started
raining like crazy.

196342.「そんで ちょうどよく こうして虹のアーチが\n 出現したんだな～。遊び人の間で:
And then, out of nowhere, that rainbow arch
popped up! The rumored spectacular view among
gadabouts is really true after all!

196343.「おっと！ こうしちゃいられねーぞ！\n おい みんな～！ 遊び人として\n や:
Hey! We can't just stand around here! Hey,
you guys! As gadabouts, you already know
what you should be doing, right?!

196344.「<pc>っちは カメラを頼んだぜ！\n さあ いそげ いそげ～っ！:
I'll leave the camera to you, <pc>!
Hurry up, come on, come on!

196346.「よっしゃ！ 撮れたか！\n <pc>っちの ウデを信じよう！:
Yesss! Did you get it?!
I'll trust your judgment on this one!

196347.「さーて 遊び人の仕事は まだ終わってねーぞ！\n お家に帰るまでが 遊びだぜ～:
Buuut, as a gadabout, your work's far from
over! Not 'til you get back home! Let's meet
back at the Gadabode! West begards!

196348.「イエ～イ！ アゲアゲじゃないっすか～！: Yaaay! It's so exciting, isn't it?!

196349.「ホントだ～ いいね！ なカンジに撮れてる～！\n <pc>ちゃん さっすがぁ！:
It really is great! You really captured the
feeling! I had no doubts you could do it!
You're really spectacular, too! ♪

196352.「そか！ <pc>っちは パイセンの\n ディナータイム見んの はじめてだっけな:
Oh, yeah! This is the first time you'll be
seein' Paisen's dinner, isn't it?

196353.「パイセンは こうして ビームを当てることで\n 写真をスキャンして 掲示板にア:
Paisen has this awesome feature where he can
scan photos using his beam and upload them
to our bulletin board!

196354.「遊び人たちのウワサじゃ パイセンは\n こうして 写真にやどった 遊び心を取り:
Rumor among gadabouts is that he captures the
playful spirit contained in these photos for fuel
and to keep things movin', ya know!

196355.「パイセンはね～ ずいぶん昔から 遊び人を\n やってるみたいでね～ あたしたち:
Paisen...seems like he's been a gadabout
forever, huh? For us, he's been our greatest
teacher...

196356.「だけど パイセンが いったい何者なのかは\n 誰も 知らなくてね～……。\n:
But no one really knows who Paisen is...
He somehow just joined the Play Club
without anyone noticing...

196357.「クゥ～～ッ！ そんな ミステリアスなとこも\n パイセンってば やべぇ～っすわ:
Wheeew! Those mysterious aspects make you
soooo cool, Paisen! You're the coolest! Never
doubted you for a second!

196361.「ヒューッ！ けっこー好評みたいっすね！: Woooow! Looks like everyone loves it!

196362.「アップした写真に いいね！ がつくとさ～\n ああして ハートんとこが ピカピ:
When you upload a photo and it gets a "Like! When you upload a photo and it gets a "Like", you get a little glow in your heart!
Hit perfection this time!

196363.「つー感じで これが 遊び人の仕事ってワケよ。\n <pc>っち グッジョブだっ:
And that's what gadabouts do. Good job,
<pc>! Here's your share of the treat.
Good job!

196364.「うっしゃ！ <pc>っちの遊びは\n まだ 始まったばかり！ こっから\n み:
Oooh! The fun for <pc> has only just
begun! From here on out, we're all going to
play around the world!
